Frédéric Chopin

Prélude in F major and Andantino in D minor, KK Anh. Ia/2–3

1845 · Chomiński – · Brown –

Total duration: 1' 30"

  • 1. Prélude in F major, KK Anh. Ia/2
  • 2. Andantino in D minor, KK Anh. Ia/3

These pieces are possibly spurious.

1. Prélude in F major, KK Anh. Ia/2

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

2. Andantino in D minor, KK Anh. Ia/3

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1
